titleStmt.title: Fragmentary inscription in honour of the praet. prefect Probus from Trajan’s Forum in Rome

msIdentifier.repository: Roma, Museo dei Fori Imperiali, Basilica Ulpia

summary.term: Honorary inscription for the praetorian prefect Petronius Probus

dimensions.corresp: fr. b with fr. c, according to Paribeni

layout.rs: The inscription consists of three fragments: ‘a’ is the corona; ‘b’ is the upper central fragment of the base; ‘c’ is the the upper left part of the base, lost (the central, right and lower part of the base are lost).

history.provenance: found in 1933 in Trajan’s Forum in Rome

div.ab:
Petronio Probo, viro clarissimo, quaestori candidato,
praetori urbano, proconsuli Africae, praefecto
praetorio quater, consuli ordinario,
sublimi v
ti pi

app.note: quater Italiae, illyrici, Africae, Galliarum, co(n)s(uli) ord(inario), Paribeni 1933
sublimi virtute bonitateq(ue) praestan/ti piissimo , Niquet in CIL

div.p: “To Petronius Probus. To Petronius Probus, of clarissimus rank, candidate quaestor, urban praetor, proconsul of Africa, praetorian prefect four times, ordinary consul, sublime ...”.
“À Petronius Probus. À Petronius Probus, clarissime, questeur candidat, préteur urbain, proconsul d’Afrique, préfet du prétoire quatre fois, consul ordinaire, sublime ...”.
“A Petronius Probus. Al chiarissimo Petronio Probo, questore candidato, pretore urbano, proconsole d’Africa, prefetto del pretorio quattro volte, console ordinario, sublime ...”.
